#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
int dig(int x)
{
	int y=0;
	while(x/10)
	{
		y++;
		x/=10;
	}
	return y;
}
int greatest(int n,map<int,int> &memo,int& great)
{
	if(memo.count(n)>0)
	return 0;
	else
	{
		memo[n]=1;
		int digit=dig(n);
		int x=1;
		int left,right;
		for(int i=0;i<digit;i++)
		x*=10;
		left=((n%x)*10)+(n/x);
		if(left>great)
		great=left;
		right=((n%10)*x)+(n/10);
		if(right>great)
		great=right;
		left=greatest(left,memo,great);
		right=greatest(right,memo,great);
		return great;
	}
}	 
int main()
{
	int t,digit,great,n,i,j;
	scanf("%i",&t);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		great=0;
		map<int, int> memo;
		scanf("%i",&n);
		printf("%i\n",greatest(n,memo,great));
	}
	return 0;
}
